_header: And since I have told you here
Subjects: Eugenia, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Eugenia, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
ande sene I haf tald ȝou hereof theodera to god sa
                    dere…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…for ws þat we of lyf ma twynbut schame det & dedly
                    syne

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.124-51.
